Articles.Content:
Has a video or any other kind of tutorial ever been posted to help with the installation of panels? I'm having a PITA time trying to get them to work right. Once, ONCE, I was able to get one to work with Sunday Punch's 2m panels. I DL'd Wulf's, (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=611.0) but cannot for the life of me figure out how to get them set right. They always want to attach halfway up whatever shroud/adapter I'm using.

Any help or advice?
ya i need help with that to so your not alone on that one.

I can tell you how to use Sunday's panel sections..

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=79.msg16410#msg16410

Example video:

At 2:10 the panel sep starts. I have the stack like this as can be seen in the video:

Command

Hollow decoupler shroud 1m -> 2m

Mini decoupler

Payload

Another decoupler

Load bearing adapter 2m -> 1m

The panels are attached to the lower decoupler. It can be fiddly to get the size of the gap to place the planels just right, but generally with some creativity you can get close enough.

Thanks for the response. Gonna get some more practice in now.

ETA: Success with the SP parts! Thanks again.
